directions: Combine sugar and orange in a food processor; pulse until coarsely chopped. Add cranberries, gelatin mix, celery, and pecan pieces; pulse briefly until coarsely chopped. Pour into a serving bowl.
ingredients: 1 large navel orange, unpeeled and quartered
1 (6 ounce) package raspberry-flavored gelatin mix (such as Jell-O®)
1 thin slice orange, twisted into a wheel
title: Best Cranberry Orange Relish
